sections.heading: Amendments; official and sample ballots; printing
sections.text: The ballots shall be printed, both official and sample, in conformity with the provisions of the Election Act regulating ballots at a general election.SourceLaws 1895, c. 5, § 2, p. 70;R.S.1913, § 3705;C.S.1922, § 3093;C.S.1929, § 49-208;R.S.1943, §
